page.title: 08 Trade.
page.content: {The Butcher. } We interviewed people shopping at the Butcher's.He gets his meat from Manchester and keeps it in a Cold Room.The most popular meat is stew and steak,people mostly buying beef,pork and lamb.The most expensive meat is fillet steak.On average people use the shop 3 times a week.Most people spent over Â£5.Many thought it was good value.All the customers were ladies aged between 35 and 60. {The Bollin Cafe and Bakery. } At the Bollin Cafe they get approximately 300 customers each day. Brown bread is more popular than white.Quite often people queue and Friday is the busiest day of the week.Some people shop twice a week, some three times and one customer we interviewed shops four times.
